alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 6:34PM MDT until September 08 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 634 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles west of Owanka, or 26 miles east of Rapid City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Owanka around 640 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include northern Badlands National Park. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 80 and 108. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly.
